messages.message: Is there a section you can share that i can turn it back on in our sandbox?

Hi Josh
so, actually, some effort is needed to switch it on
here is a place where we suppose to add the provenance
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/marketplace/ibllm/src/py/pkg/model/tasks/extraction.py#L86

we need to apply a similar functionality for build mode as we have for chat (with the exception that we need provenance on the word level on build, not the whole region)
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/marketplace/ibllm/src/py/pkg/model/tasks/multi_doc.py#L91

We plan to work on this shortly after the hackathon
can it wait until then? do you need it for your hackathon project?
we may fix it on our side for the ibhack project to auto annotate
